Name: Container.Tab
Desc: Tabbed navigation component for organizing content.
LongDesc: The Container.Tab method creates a tabbed interface for switching between multiple content panels. It supports horizontal and vertical layouts, dynamic tab addition/removal, and programmatic tab selection and disabling.
Example:
var tab = Q.Container().Tab([{ title: 'Tab 1', value: 't1', content: 'Content 1' }, { title: 'Tab 2', value: 't2', content: 'Content 2' }]);
document.body.appendChild(tab);
